data.title: Mammootty : Age, Height, Career, Movies, Affairs, Net Worth
data.meta_description: Mammootty was born on 7 September 1951 in Chandiroor, Kerala. Age Height Career Movies Affairs Net Worth
data.text:
He is a famous South Indian actor. He was born on 7 September 1951 in Chandiroor, Kerala. His real name is Muhammad Kutty Ismail Paniparambil. He is an actor and producer. His height is 5.10 inches, 1.78 meters, 178 centimeters. His weight is 85 kilograms, 188 pounds. He is currently 72 years old.

He started his career with the film Anubhavangal Paalichakal. It was made by director K Sethu Madhavan. With his acting skills, he showed people that he is an excellent artist. He earned his name as one of the best actors in the 70s. He continuously gave hat-trick films after hat-trick. People kept saying that there is something special in his acting. There is some magic in his face. He has become the face of a famous actor in films. He is still giving films after films. Whatever role is given to him, he performs all the roles very well.

His father’s name is Ismail Panparambil and mother’s name is Fatima Panparambil. He was the eldest in the family. His three younger sisters are Amina, Sauda, ​​Shafina. He has two younger brothers Ibrahim, Zakaria. He married Sulfath Kuti on 6 May 1979. They have two children, a girl named Kuti Surumai and a boy named Dulquer Salmaan. Their daughter was born in 1982. Their son was born on 28 July 1983. Their son is also a famous actor.
